biotools.summary: ArrayMining.net is a server for automatic analysis of DNA-microarray data, providing Cross-study normalisation, Feature selection, Clustering, Prediction, Co-Expression Network Analysis and Gene Set analysis (BMC Bioinformatics, 2009, http://www.biomedcentral.com/1471-2105/10/358)
